Keywords: Pirate , Soldier , Starjammers
Real Name: Christopher Summers
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: CH'OD, HEPZIBAH, RAZA, WALDO, SIKORSKY: If 1+ listed friendly characters are on the map, Corsair and listed friendly characters can use Willpower. If 3+ are on the map, Corsair and listed friendly character's displayed defense powers gain Protected: Outwit. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
02
TEAM UP: STARJAMMERS THEMED TEAM: When establishing themed teams, friendly characters with the Shi'ar and Imperial Guard keywords gain the Starjammers keyword. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
LEADER OF THE SWASHBUCKLING SPACE PIRATES: Leadership, Probability Control. // Once per turn, you may reroll the attack roll of a friendly character with the Starjammers keyword.

C-Dog
Look at all that neck. Pretty sure his mom was a giraffe.
January 9, 2021
Cyke82
I like what Corsair brings to the table. Sees through hindering as a solid secondary attacker, traited Leadership and Prob give him some solid support bonafides. That Enhancement came in handy when I played him and paired him with another range attacker. He can bring the nasty up close if he gets hit, too. My kingdom for some Willpower, but alas, it wasn’t meant to be (unless teaming up with another classic crewmate).
January 8, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 0-1 Corsair is a major upgrade since his Critical Mass appearance and is a strong secondary attacker in today's game. Traited Leadership coupled with Prob Control is so powerful for 60 points. The ability to reroll an attack roll for a friendly Starjammer makes him very deadly as he can use it on himself or even a pal somewhere across the map. Throw in a little IT: Hindering and you will never be upset at fielding Chris Summers. Fantastic piece, even without his team-up cards.
